mapper.select: SELECT LECTURE_CODE, LECTURE_NAME, LECTURE_COURSETYPE, LECTURE_CREDIT, LECTURE_TARGET, U.USER_NAME PRO_NAME, LECTURE_CAPACITY, L.USER_ID PRO_ID, OPENSEME_NO, MID_DATE, FINAL_DATE, LOWER_ORGANIZATION, NVL((SELECT COUNT(ATTEND_NO) FROM ATTEND A GROUP BY LECTURE_CODE HAVING A.LECTURE_CODE= L.LECTURE_CODE),'0')LECTURE_CURRENT FROM LECTURE L INNER JOIN USERS U ON (L.USER_ID=U.USER_ID) WHERE OPENSEME_NO= #{openseme_no} AND lecture_code NOT IN (SELECT lecture_code FROM ATTEND WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id})
